view.GUI

Class MazeDisplayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
        • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
          • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
            • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Canvas
              • view.GUI.MazeDisplayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Maze3D

    public abstract class MazeDisplayer
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Canvas
    This class includes all the common methods for displaying a GUI Maze. This class extends Canvas class, thus it allows us to converting a Maze instance into a widget, as the Canvas class provides us a surface for drawing arbitrary graphics. In other words, now we can use all the widget methods, for every Maze instance.
    Author:
    Yotam Levy & Tomer Brami
